Ingredients.2: 1 (3 pound) Butterball® Boneless Breast of Turkey Roast, thawed

Ingredients.8: 2 loaves  Cuban, French or Italian bread (15 inches long)

Directions.1: Spray cold grate of outdoor gas grill with cooking spray. Prepare grill for medium indirect heat.

Directions.2: Remove turkey from package. Dry with paper towels. Discard gravy packet or refrigerate for another use (within 2 - 3 days). Lift string netting and shift position on roast for easier removal after cooking. Cut small slits, at least 1 inch apart, over entire surface of turkey. Insert 1 garlic slice into each slit. Brush turkey with oil.

Directions.3: Combine cumin, salt and pepper. Sprinkle over turkey.

Directions.4: Place turkey on grill grate over drip pan. Cover grill with lid. Grill 1 1/4 to 1-3/4 hours, or until meat thermometer reaches 170 degrees F when inserted into center of roast. Remove from grill. Let stand 10 minutes.

Directions.5: Remove string netting. Cut half of the turkey into six 1/8-inch-thick slices. Set aside. Refrigerate unsliced turkey for another use.

Directions.6: Cut each bread loaf lengthwise in half. Then, cut each into 3 pieces (for 6 sandwiches). Spread the bottom half of each section with 2 teaspoons mustard. Top with the sliced turkey, ham, cheese and pickles. Cover with tops of bread loaves. Press sandwiches with hands to flatten. Tightly wrap individually in aluminum foil.

Directions.7: Place wrapped sandwiches on grill grate. Top each with heavy iron skillet or brick. Grill 3 to 5 minutes on each side, or until heated through.

Directions.8: Serve sandwiches warm, wrapped in aluminum foil.
